1. City Administrator

City Administrator
==================

Under the direction and authority of the mayor, the city administrator oversees, administers and coordinates the activities and functions of all city officers, departments, commissions and boards to implement city ordinances and policies through the effective use of city employees, funds, grants, materials, facilities and time, and shall control the overall operations of the city to assure optimum service to the community.



![positional org chart](https://stanwoodwa.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=4974)
![Functional Org Chart](https://stanwoodwa.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=4975)
